page.description: The RESOLVE_MIME_TYPE() function returns a properly formatted and legal mime type suitable for use in a page header or response header.
page.deprecated: This function is deprecated and will not be available in future versions. Use [Context.ResolveMimeType()] instead.

argument.name: Mime_Type
argument.description: A formatted definition of a mime type suitable for use in a page header or response header. The response is "text/html" if the File_Type cannot be identified.

argument.name: file_extension
argument.description: A Windows file type in the format: ". XYZ " . Character
